title: This is an Abomination of Justice (Ep 1239)
description:
In this episode I address the explosive revelations in the scandalous attack on General Mike Flynn. I also address the resurfacing of a disgusting media attack. Finally, I address an inexcusable attack on the Second Amendment by the Supreme Court. 

News Picks:


What did Obama know, and when did he know it?


The political case against Mike Flynn is falling apart.


The tech tyrants are adopting Soviet-style techniques to suppress science and freedom of expression.

Pelosi pushes for a massive state bailout, despite the fact that we have no money. 


Yahoo “journalist” gets totally wrecked in the White House while trying to promote fake news. 

The Washington Post ignores reality and tries to promote an already debunked story. 


The myth of how the Great Depression was resolved.
